%n files were imported from OneDrive storage.
translations.Microsoft OneDrive integration allows yo: Microsoft OneDrive integration allows you to automatically import your OneDrive files into Nextcloud.
translations.Failed to save OneDrive admin options: Failed to save OneDrive admin options
translations.If you want to allow your Nextcloud user: If you want to allow your Nextcloud users to use OAuth to authenticate to https://onedrive.live.com, create an OAuth application in your Azure settings.
translations.Set \"Application name\" to a value that: Set "Application name" to a value that will make sense to your Nextcloud users as they will see it when connecting to OneDrive using your OAuth app.
translations.Make sure you set the \"Redirect URI\" t: Make sure you set the "Redirect URI" to
translations.Create a client secret in \"Certificates: Create a client secret in "Certificates & secrets".
translations.Put the OAuth app \"Client ID\" and \"Cl: Put the OAuth app "Client ID" and "Client secret" below.
translations.Your Nextcloud users will then see a \"C: Your Nextcloud users will then see a "Connect to OneDrive" button in their personal settings.
translations.Client ID of your OneDrive application: Client ID of your OneDrive application
translations.Client secret of your OneDrive applicati: Client secret of your OneDrive application
